channel.title: Online Home of Rajkumar
channel.description: Recent content on Online Home of Rajkumar

item.title: vCard Editor
item.description: Are you preparing for an exciting journey abroad?

item.title: Notify Abroad
item.description: When I came to the US for my master’s, it was an unavoidable need to have access to the OTPs or calls that come to my Indian number, which, by the way, I left at home.

item.title: Boredom, Books & Bugs
item.description: With millions of people stuck at home during the COVID-19 crisis, many explored various new hobbies to keep themselves occupied and ensure that they are not unduly stressed.

item.title: Building a J2EE app using IntelliJ Idea and deploying on Heroku
item.description: Let’s see how to build a basic Java Enterprise (fondly known as J2EE) application, made up of a Servlet and a JSP file, with the help of the popular IDE by Jetbrains, IntelliJ Idea.

item.title: Badgie - My first native GTK app
item.description: elementary OS has been my favourite Linux distro for quite a long time because of its beautiful UI, less bloatware which lets me focus on the work that needs to be done.

item.title: Amrita Repository - Suite of Apps
item.description: In my first year of college, during the time of examinations more than 60% of my class used to pester those one or two guys who used to download the previous year question papers for reference from an intranet site (which still remains a mystery to most of the students).

item.title: Farewell at Internshala
item.description: Today was my last working day at Internshala and guess what!

item.title: CodeChef Interview Experience
item.description: I’m a regular user at LinkedIn and I came across the Software Development Engineer Internship’s poster by CodeChef when I was browsing through the feed one day.

item.title: Book Shelf
item.description: Oh, and I love reading non-fiction books!
